name: PHImageRequestOptionsResizeMode
desc: Options for how to resize the requested image to fit a target size, used by the resizeMode property.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Photos does not resize the image asset.

items.name: case fast
items.desc: Photos efficiently resizes the image to a size similar to, or slightly larger than, the target size.

items.name: case exact
items.desc: Photos resizes the image to match the target size exactly.
